LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

  • Apple iPad mini 4 with Retina display & Touch ID
  • Used (see below for description)
  • General Features:
  • 4th Generation Mini
  • Color: Black & Space Gray
  • Supports iOS 10
  • A8 64‑bit Dual-Core processor and M8 motion coprocessor
  • 2GB of LPDDR3 RAM
  • 32GB storage capacity
  • Built‑in stereo speakers
  • Audio frequency response: 20Hz to 20,000Hz
  • Wi‑Fi (802.11a/​b/​g/​n/​ac); dual band (2.4GHz and 5GHz); HT80 with MIMO
  • Bluetooth 4.2 wireless technology
  • 1.2MP front facing camera
  • 8MP rear facing iSight Camera
  • Record HD Video in 1080p (30 fps)
  • Dual microphones for calls, video recording, and audio recording
  • 7.9-inch LED display with IPS Technology (2048 x 1536 Resolution, 326 ppi, Retina Display)
  • Siri Included
  • Apple Pay
  • Over 300,000 Apps from the App Store
  • Fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating
  • Fully laminated display
  • Antireflective coating
  • Touch ID Fingerprint Sensor built into the Home button

  • Touch ID

  • Accelerometer
  • Barometer
  • Ambient light sensor
  • Touch ID:
  • Unlock iPad
  • Secure personal data within apps
  • Make purchases from the iTunes Store, App Store, and iBooks Store
  • Siri:
  • Use your voice to send messages, set reminders, and more
  • Use your iPad hands-free
  • Listen and identify songs
  • iSight Camera:
  • 8MP iSight camera
  • Autofocus
  • Panorama (up to 43MP)
  • Auto HDR for photos
  • Exposure control
  • Burst mode
  • Tap to focus
  • Timer mode
  • ƒ/2.4 aperture
  • Five-element lens
  • Hybrid IR ﬁlter
  • Backside illumination
  • Auto image stabilization
  • Face detection
  • Photo geotagging
  • FaceTime HD Camera:
  • 1.2MP photos
  • ƒ/2.2 aperture
  • 720p HD video recording
  • Backside illumination
  • Auto HDR photos and videos
  • Improved face detection
  • Burst mode
  • Exposure control
  • Timer mode
  • Video Recording:
  • 1080p HD video recording (30 fps)
  • Slo-mo (120 fps)
  • Time-lapse video with stabilization
  • Video image stabilization
  • Improved face detection
  • 3x video zoom
  • Video geotagging
  • I/O Ports & Buttons:
  • On/Off - Sleep/Wake Button
  • Volume Up/Down Button
  • Home/Touch ID Sensor Button
  • Built-in dual Microphones
  • Built-in Speakers
  • One (1) Lightning Connector
  • One (1) 3.5mm Stereo Headphone jack
  • Supported Media:
  • Video: H.264, AVI, Motion JPEG, MPEG-4, Quicktime
  • Audio: ACC, Protected ACC, HE-AAC, MP3, MP3 VBR, AAX, AAX+, Apple Lossless, AIFF and WAV
  • Images: BMP, GIF, JEPG, JEPG 2000, PNG, RAW, TIFF
  • Online Services:
  • iTunes Store
  • App Store
  • iBookstore
  • iCloud
  • Built-in Apps:
  • Safari
  • Mail
  • iBooks
  • Photos

  • Contacts
  • App Store
  • iTunes
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Notes
  • Camera
  • Photo Booth
  • Clock
  • Game Center
  • Power and Battery Specifications:
  • Built-in 19.1-watt-hour rechargeable lithium-polymer battery
  • Up to 10 hours of surﬁng the web on Wi‑Fi, watching video, or listening to music
  • Charging via power adapter or USB to computer system
  • Rated 5.1V--2.1A Max
  • Unit Dimensions:
  • 5.3 x 8.0 x 0.2-inches (H x W x D)
  • Weight:  0.2 lbs

  • USB to AC adapter
